settings.faq_inner_ques: What is UNDOit?
settings.faq_inner_ans: UNDOit is an anti-hangover effervescent tablet formulated to provide instant relief after a night out. It prevents hangovers, relieves symptoms like headaches and nausea, detoxifies the liver, and reduces inflammation. Made with the goodness of real, natural ingredients like <insert names>, UNDOit is 100% herbal and approved by the Department of AYUSH. It's also ISO and GMP certified, non-GMO, paraben-free, and contains no added sugars. With its refreshing flavors, UNDOit ensures a hassle-free morning after.

settings.faq_inner_ques: How does UNDOit work?
settings.faq_inner_ans: Our specially formulated blend of vitamins, electrolytes, and natural ingredients helps to replenish nutrients lost during alcohol consumption, supporting your body's recovery process.  <fill in more info as and when we gain clarity>

settings.faq_inner_ques: How do I consume UNDOit?
settings.faq_inner_ans: Simply drop a tablet into water, let it fizz away, then drink up! Simple as that.

settings.faq_inner_ans: Absolutely! Feel free to mix it with your preferred non-alcoholic drink, but avoid carbonation for optimal results. <not sure, just treat the answer as a placeholder text>

settings.faq_inner_ques: Can I adjust the dosage of UNDOit based on my alcohol intake?
settings.faq_inner_ans: Stick to the recommended dose as indicated on the packaging for a smoother journey. No need to overdo it!

settings.faq_inner_ques: How long does UNDOit remain effective?
settings.faq_inner_ans: UNDOit is a long-lasting ally. With a shelf-life of <insert duration> from the "Best Before End" (BBE) date, it's always primed to tackle those hangover blues whenever you need it.

settings.faq_inner_ques: How many tablets should I take for a heavy drinking session?
settings.faq_inner_ans: Follow the recommended dosage on the packaging, and if it's a night of epic proportions, an extra tablet won't hurt. Just keep it sensible!

settings.faq_inner_ques: Can I take UNDOit on an empty stomach?
settings.faq_inner_ans: It's perfectly fine to take it on an empty stomach, but if you're feeling fancy, pair it with a snack for an even smoother experience.

settings.faq_inner_ques: Should I take UNDOit in the morning or at night?
settings.faq_inner_ans: It's best to take UNDOit after your last drink, whether that's in the evening or late at night. It works to support your body's recovery process, so you can wake up feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day ahead.

settings.faq_inner_ques: How long does it take for UNDOit to work?
settings.faq_inner_ans: UNDOit kicks into action as soon as it's dissolved in water. Just remember, everyone's body is unique, so results may vary. But trust us, your future self will thank you for it!

settings.faq_inner_ques: How soon should I take UNDOit after drinking alcohol?
settings.faq_inner_ans:
ASAP after your last drink or before hitting the hay for a night of partying. Don't procrastinate on feeling better!

When should I take UNDOit?

We recommend taking one tablet before or during alcohol consumption, and another after your last drink to maximize its effectiveness.

settings.faq_inner_ques: Is UNDOit safe to use?
settings.faq_inner_ans: 100%, UNDOit is made with carefully selected ingredients and is safe for consumption when used as directed.

settings.faq_inner_ques: Does UNDOit prevent me from getting drunk?
settings.faq_inner_ans: No, UNDOit does not prevent intoxication. It's designed to help alleviate the symptoms of a hangover by supporting your body's recovery process.

settings.faq_inner_ques: Can I take UNDOit if I'm pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.faq_inner_ans: We recommend consulting with a healthcare professional before using Undoit if you are pregnant, breastfeeding, or have any underlying health conditions.

settings.faq_inner_ques: Are there any side effects of using UNDOit?
settings.faq_inner_ans: UNDOit is generally well-tolerated, but as with any supplement, some individuals may experience mild side effects. If you experience any adverse reactions, discontinue use and consult with a healthcare professional.

settings.faq_inner_ques: Can I take UNDOit with other medications?
settings.faq_inner_ans: If you're currently taking medication or have any medical concerns, we advise consulting with a healthcare professional before using UNDOit to ensure there are no potential interactions.

settings.faq_inner_ques: Is UNDOit suitable for vegetarian, vegan, or gluten-free diets?
settings.faq_inner_ans: Yes! UNDOit checks all the boxes – it's vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free.
